com.google.zson - package com.google.zson
This package provides the Zson class to convert Json to Java and vice-versa.

This package provides annotations that can be used with Zson.
com.google.zson.reflect - package com.google.zson.reflect
This package provides utility classes for finding type information for generic types.

excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation() - Method in class com.google.zson.ZsonBuilder

ExclusionStrategy - Interface in com.google.zson
A strategy (or policy) definition that is used to decide whether or not a field or top-level class should be serialized or deserialized as part of the JSON output/input.
Expose - Annotation Type in com.google.zson.annotations
An annotation that indicates this member should be exposed for JSON serialization or deserialization.

getDeclaredType() - Method in class com.google.zson.FieldAttributes
For example, assume the following class definition: 
 public class Foo {
   private String bar;
   private List<String> red;
 }

 Type listParmeterizedType = new TypeToken<List<String>>() {}.getType();
